greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse of matrix (1,x)+(x,x^2) (expressed in Riordan array notation).
comment: Row sums are A035263 (first Feigenbaum symbolic (or period-doubling) sequence). Columns are signed stretched Fredholm-Rueppel sequences. Inverse is A115356.
formula: Number triangle whose k-th column has g.f. x^k*sum{j>=0, (-1)^j*(x^(2j-1))^(k+1)}.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jan 21 2006
